Section.name: About VVIT
Section.description:
Vasireddy Venkatadri Institute Of Technology (VVIT), a premier Private (Autonomous) College of Andhra Pradesh which was established in 2007 under Social Educational Trust by Sri. Vasireddy Vidya Sagar to provide world-class technical education to conquer tomorrow's technology at the global level with human values. It is situated in Nambur village, Pedakakani Mandal of Guntur district, Andhra Pradesh. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate Engineering courses and MCA. VVIT has emerged as one of the top ten Engineering Colleges from the 200 engineering colleges affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and accredited to NAAC by ‘A’ grade. Its B.Tech- ECE, EEE, CSE, ME & IT programs are accredited by NBA.
Know more about VVIT Admission Process

The college has the following departments through which it provides it’s uniquely designed career-oriented education for all the eligible candidates.
Under VVIT Admissions 2023, the college provides the following courses which are listed below:
Course Name
Eligibility
Exam Accepted
B.Tech
Applicants must have passed Intermediate/ HSC or its equivalent examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Andhra Pradesh with Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry (as an optional subject). Also, the candidate should have qualified EAMCET conducted by the Govt. of A.P.
AP EAMCET
M.Tech
Candidates must have completed BE/ B.Tech in the concerned discipline/ or have AMIE/ AMIETE recognized by UPSC as equivalent to BE/ B.Tech along with valid GATE score or have qualified PGECET. Andhra Pradesh.
PGECET or GATE rank
MCA
Candidate must have studied Mathematics at 10+2 level and in Graduation as well. It is mandatory for the applicants to qualify ICET conducted by AP State Council of Higher Education, Government of AP.
AP ICET rank
